mapper.select: select projectNo, categoryName, projectName, to_char(udate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') udate, to_char(projectStartDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') projectStartDate, to_char(projectEndDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') projectEndDate, projectStatus from project p, category c where p.categoryNo=c.categoryNo and projectStatus=1 order by udate
mapper.update: update project set projectStatus=2, projectStep=#{projectStep} where projectNo=#{projectNo}
update project set projectStatus=4 where projectNo=#{projectNo}
